snippet: Dr. Brothers arrived at the exact historical moment when cold war anxiety, a greater acceptance of talk therapy and the widespread ownership of television sets converged.
abstract: Joyce Brothers, former academic psychologist who for years counseled millions of people over the airwaves, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Brothers arrived at the exact historical moment when cold war anxiety, a greater acceptance of talk therapy and the widespread ownership of television sets converged.

headline.seo: Dr. Joyce Brothers, Psychologist Who Dispensed Advice to Millions, Dies at 85
headline.main: Dr. Joyce Brothers, On-Air Psychologist Who Made TV House Calls, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: Dr. Joyce Brothers, On-Air Psychologist Who Made TV House Calls, Dies at 85
